resources.string: Get additional info about connected sensors, and display options to add sensors.
This is a temporary placeholder text. Here we will write the necessary text for the privacy agreement.

According to the Creative Commons license, we would like to give credit to Concordia\'s OpenData program for allowing us to use the Library\'s opening hours and occupancy data for our app. Moreover, we agree to the terms and conditions of the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International Public License. More detail can be found at the following URL: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode
